c74object.name: bach.minfo
c74object.description: Outputs the number of rows and columns of an incoming matrix, plus an additional information which tells us whether the matrix is well-shaped or square.

outlet.digest: 1 if the matrix is well-shaped, 0 otherwise
1 if the matrix is square, 0 otherwise
1 if the matrix is symmetrical, 0 otherwise

method.name: llll
method.description:
The object outputs the information about the incoming matrix.
In the bach environment, a matrix is just a llll having depth two, whose first-level sublllls are the rows of the matrix. For instance the matrix [1 0 0] [0 1 0] [0 0 1] is the 3 by 3 identity matrix. A "good" matrix is supposed to be well formed, i.e. all its rows must have the same length. A matrix is square if the length of the rows (which is the number of columns) is the same as the number of rows.

c74object.discussion: In the bach environment, a matrix is just a llll having depth two, whose first-level sublllls are the rows of the matrix. For instance the matrix [1 0 0] [0 1 0] [0 0 1] is the 3 by 3 identity matrix. A "good" matrix is supposed to be well formed, i.e. all its rows must have the same length. A matrix is square if the length of the rows (which is the number of columns) is the same as the number of rows.

entry.name: Outlet 3 (int)
entry.description: 1 if the matrix is well-shaped, 0 otherwise.

entry.name: Outlet 4 (int)
entry.description: 1 if the matrix is square, 0 otherwise.

entry.name: Outlet 5 (int)
entry.description: 1 if the matrix is symmetrical, 0 otherwise.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: In the bach environment, a matrix is just a llll having depth two, whose first-level sublllls are the rows of the matrix. For instance the matrix [1 0 0] [0 1 0] [0 0 1] is the 3 by 3 identity matrix. A "good" matrix is supposed to be well formed, i.e. all its rows must have the same length. A matrix is square if the length of the rows (which is the number of columns) is the same as the number of rows.
